article_title: SWiFT Seeing the Wood From the Trees: helping people make sense of their health data
article_authors: Brown  Dan,Duce  David,Franklin  Rachel,Harrison  Rachel,Martin  Clare,Waite  Marion
abstract: The aim of the SWIFT project is to determine which visualisations of blood glucose-related data on mobile devices are most usable by people with insulin-dependent diabetes, to improve self-management.
